name: One Tile Only
description:
Made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam, this game is a puzzle game where you only have one shape available to fill the whole level.

The controls are explained in the game, but here they are again just in case:

  • Left Mouse Button: Place tile
  • Right Mouse Button: Remove tile
  • Tab or Space: Rotate Tile

There are 34 handcrafted levels inside. You can skip already completed levels using the buttons in the bottom corners.

Thank you for playing!
